name: Woodcutters Hut
description:
A mysterious person has called you to the Woodcutters Hut. But your investigation of the matter has made you very suspicious. You now head there with cautious steps. What might you uncover at the hut?

Woodcutters  Hut was made as a highschool project. The game was made December 2018 in Unreal Engine 4. The team included Mattias "Mau" Lundell, Miguel Verdezoto Barros and Fredrika Månsson.
